.info>.description{height:var(--max-info-desc);max-height:var(--max-info-desc);--end-col:hsla(0,0%,100%,0%);transition:height 1s ease,max-height 1s ease,--end-col 1s}.book-player-info.-overflow.-expand .info>.drawer .text:after{content:"COLLAPSE"}.book-player-info.-overflow.-expand .info>.description{height:var(--min-info-desc);max-height:var(--min-info-desc);--end-col:hsl(0,0%,100%,100%);transition:height 1s ease,max-height 1s ease,--end-col 1s}.book-player-info.book{padding-top:2em;padding-bottom:2em;background-color:var(--col-purple-dark)}@media screen and (min-width:0){.book-player-info.book .image img{width:100%;height:100%;object-fit:contain}}@media screen and (max-width:479px){.book-player-info.book .image{width:5cm}}@media screen and (min-width:480px){.book-player-info.book .image{height:var(--min-book-info)}.book-player-info.book .image img{object-position:top right;z-index:1}}@media screen and (min-width:960px){.book-player-info.book .image{height:var(--max-book-info)}}.book-player-info.author{background-color:var(--col-gold-dim)}@media screen and (min-width:0){.book-player-info.author .image img{border-radius:100%;height:3cm;width:3cm;object-fit:cover;object-position:center}}@media screen and (min-width:480px) and (max-width:959px){.book-player-info.author .image img{width:2cm;height:2cm}}.book-player-info.reader{background-color:var(--col-grey-light)}@media screen and (min-width:0){.book-player-info.reader .image img{border-radius:100%;height:2cm;width:2cm;object-fit:cover;object-position:center}}@media screen and (min-width:480px) and (max-width:959px){.book-player-info.reader .image img{width:2cm;height:2cm}}.book-player-info.editor{background-color:var(--col-white);box-shadow:none;border-bottom:var(--line-width) solid var(--col-grey-light);padding-top:1cm;padding-bottom:1cm}.book-player-info.editor .title:before{content:"Edited by "}@media screen and (min-width:0){.book-player-info.editor .image
